attributes.title: Building and scaling your (CRO) agency, with Steven Pavlovich and Daniël Markus
attributes.summary:
This is a bonus episode recorded live with audience pre-covid-19 at the Conversion Hotel conference in November 2019 on the island of Texel in The Netherlands.

This session is with
* Stephen Pavlovich, CEO from Converison.com
* Daniel Markus, Co-founder at ClickValue
attributes.description: Guest 1: Stephen Pavlovich URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/stephen-pavlovich | Guest 2: Daniël Markus URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/daniel-markus
